function RYU_EP05_16()
    -- .転-3【2月第4週】「伊草エリカの『妹』」
    SaveData.Title = "伊草エリカの『妹』"

    -- //BG：メインストリート（夕方）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2139.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hiyu-san!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav",0)

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019be")
--LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,800,0)

    -- //BU：ヒユ（驚き）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ca")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",1000,false)

    MSG([[ I barely caught up to Hiyu-san just as we reached the school gate. ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san turned around in surprise, clenching her fist tightly and twisting her expression. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0478.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Please don’t misunderstand. That speech earlier was my way of repaying the kindness you’ve shown me so far." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0479.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "You’re leaving the academy soon anyway, right? So please don’t come near me any more than you have to." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2140.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "No." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ca")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0480.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Whaat?" ]])

    MSG([[ Taking a step closer to the flustered Hiyu-san, I put my honest feelings into words. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2141.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "No matter what you think. No matter how much you hate me. To me, Erika Ikusa, you are my dear friend." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2142.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I can’t say goodbye to someone like you. Because I’m truly grateful from the bottom of my heart for meeting you, Hiyu-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0481.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "That’s so selfish of you. You’re the one who said you’d leave me, sister. That’s why I didn’t want to make any more memories—I——" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ca")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0482.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Ah." ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san put her hand to her mouth and fell silent. ]])

    MSG([[ After lowering her gaze without saying a word for a moment, she grabbed hold of me. ]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（真剣）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01ba")
--LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    -- //effect：ヒユのＢＵアップ

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0483.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "I don’t want to say goodbye either!!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0484.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Take responsibility. I’ve always loved beautiful girls. I had zero interest in guys." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01da")
--LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0485.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Because of you, I’m... getting more and more messed up!" ]])

    MSG([[ Pulling hard at my uniform, Hiyu-san kept speaking in a strained voice. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0486.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "I tried to hate you all along. Over and over, I tried to hate you. But I couldn’t..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0487.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Because the thing that hurts the most... is thinking about you, Sister Erika, disappearing." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01ba")
--LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0488.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Don’t say you’ll leave after the election. Please don’t say that." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01da")
--LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0489.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "It’s okay if you’re really a guy. It’s okay if you’re a liar. But in front of me, I want you to always be my sister." ]])

    MSG([[ I touched Hiyu-san’s hand gripping my uniform tightly, gently stroking it just as I’d done before. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2143.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hiyu-san... I’m sorry for hurting you." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2144.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Please don’t worry. I won’t disappear anywhere. From now on, I will always be your sister." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0490.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Erika, Sis..." ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-400,1000,Ease.InCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,1000,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san’s hand loosened and slipped off my uniform. ]])

    MSG([[ At the same time, tears suddenly streamed down her face like a broken dam. ]])

    MSG([[ While gently stroking Hiyu-san’s sobbing head, I promised that I would continue to be her sister from now on. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP05_17")
end
